reset_pwd.title: Hello Super Traders User!
reset_pwd.subject: Super Traders Reset Password Email
reset_pwd.body: Please follow that link to reset your Super Traders account's password
reset_pwd.warning: You have 1 hour to reset your password.If you do not send this request ignore this emai

confirmation.title: Welcome Super Traders User!
confirmation.subject: Super Traders Account Confirmation Email
confirmation.body: Please confirm your account to use Super Traders
confirmation.warning: You have 1 hour to confirm your account

email_sent_resp: If your email matches email will be sent

transaction.portfolio_not: You do not have share in your portfolio

create.portfolio_denied: You do not have required rate
create.not_enough_money: You do not have enough money
create.not_enough_rate: You do not have enough rate to sell

status.unauthorized: You are unauthorized to reach that context
status.forbidden: You lack permissions to reach that context

share.update_price_time: You should wait one hour to update price from last update

portfolio.exists: There is portfolio exists with that share
portfolio.sell_asset: Please sell your related asset before portfolio deletion
